name: Winter Is Present
description:
Winter is... Present!

Winter has arrived, and it's time to get presents. Get ready for a chill day of sledding with your friends, but be careful because the more presents you collect the faster you will go!

2018 Extra Credits Holiday Jam. Theme: Present.

Use WASD or the arrow keys to steer your sled around the oncoming obstacles and collect the presents. You're at gravity's mercy now and the more presents you collect the faster you will go. Don't forget to laugh at your friends as they crash into trees and do some sick jumps when you see those ramps.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys to steer your sled
